title: Rhapsody
content: Rhapsody Very Rare 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing Scarlet Remittance: Gain a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, damage, and Spell Save DC for every foe you slay, up to a maximum of +3. Sweet Bloodletting: Possibly inflict Bleeding when hitting a creature with this weapon while Hiding or Invisible. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Cazador's love of poetry arose after he read one on the naked stomach of a dead child in his homeland.
